Sentencas: Stoichiometric and sub-stoichiometric lanthanum barium titanates (LBT) of perovskite structure type, substituted or not with Mn and/or Ce at the Ti-site, were prepared by sol-gel route with heat treatment in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.05Ba0.95Ti1-xMyO3 (M = Mn, Ce) as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All the compounds display a cubic Pm-3m symmetry, which remains stable in reducing atmosphere.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.05Ba0.95Ti1-xMyO3 (M = Mn, Ce) as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Whereas Mn substitution highly promotes the reducibility of the material, the electrical and electrochemical performance of Mn-doped compounds is decreased with respect to non-doped sub-stoichiometric LBT.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.05Ba0.95Ti1-xMyO3 (M = Mn, Ce) as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In contrast, the electrical conductivity and resistance polarization of Ce-substituted LBT are close to those of non-doped LBT and Ce-ubstituted LBT appears especially efficient in improving the catalytic properties for methane steam reforming and avoiding carbon formation.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.05Ba0.95Ti1-xMyO3 (M = Mn, Ce) as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells
